short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Users can copy blocks of code at the click of a button via copy button at bottom right of a code snippet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you hate having to highlight all that code in Stack Overflow? 

Fellow developers look no further, we have created the button you want...no; the button you NEED, the copy button (well for just for Stack Overflow). Anyway, no more straining your wrist to copy code, no more false copy to clipboards, no more CTRL + C then CTRL+V...just NO MORE! Ahem, sorry I got a little emotional there.

Anyway, install it, it's pretty handy.

Stay up to date or Request Future Features
